channel.title: Project Amazed Version 2.1 || 90% Skills || The Real Deal || The Final Release
channel.description:
This isn't the final release. My cousin which works for Java and is a real Jagex programmer. My other cousin which worked for Java was in another but got fired. I told them if they can help me do this amazing thing. Which i hope you guys like. ___________________________________________________________ [img]http://i145.photobucket.com/albums/r220/majesstik1/Threads/funny.gif[/img]
[size=24pt]Version 2.1 Content:[/size]
2 Quests Added 100% [ Working Gnome Agility + Exp 100% [ Working Slayer 100% [ Working Farming 100% [ Working Herblore 100% [ Working Cleaning Herbs 90% [ Opening ALL Single Doors 87% [ Opening ALL Double Doors 97% Real old 2007 Npcs Around 90% Real old 2007 Shops Fixed Clan Chat Fixed 5 Dupes [size=14pt]100% Good old Hitspats[/size] [size=12pt]Green = hit[/size] [size=12pt]Red = Missed[/size] Get it? Traffic Light :) Much More i forgot....
[size=24pt]Media:[/size]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2zexrn7.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/21njm0k.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/29gk0nd.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/296jjtk.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2e2kpdj.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/1r9emt.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2rokj8j.jpg[/img]
Thanks Tinypic.
[size=24pt]Downloads:[/size]
[url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/ch8wkfhnejx7let/Project%20Amazed%20V2.zip]https://www.dropbox.com/s/ch8wkfhnejx7let/Project%20Amazed%20V2.zip[/url] Direct DL [url=https://dl.dropbox.com/s/ch8wkfhnejx7let/Project%20Amazed%20V2.zip]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/ch8wkfhnejx7let/Project%20Amazed%20V2.zip[/url]
Thanks everyone.

item.title: Project Amazed Version 2.1 || 90% Skills || The Real Deal || The Final Release
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:9, topic:509850”][quote author=Project Amazed Carlos link=topic=628095.msg4268247#msg4268247 date=1364305087]
You don’t have to believe, me not my fault.
[/quote]
It’s more of the fact that you have the mentality that people in the workforce can do whatever they want and that because they work for a Java gaming company (That, by the way, boasts 10x more failures in gaming than profits). Chances are they’re under a strict contact (as most developers of big companies are) and if they did something like this (develop an illegal server), they would more than likely be fired and suing for half the shit they own, this is made even more prevalent in the fact that they’ve spend their time and money getting servers taken down.

And for your other cousin (who would actually work for Oracle, not Java), he would more than likely shriek at how shitty the code is. We’re not talking of some big business, we’re talking some shitty servers made by teenagers and basically them copy+pasting servers and snippets. Very few people in this community or in the other communities actually make a difference in servers today, witch is why you never see all these great frameworks being used, they’d rather download a PI server, slap a name on it, and put it up.[/quote]

True story.

@ Carlos- If you ask me, your life is a joke. I saw your ‘Project Amazed’ development threads. You called your cousin Carlos in the chat box. Let alone, you’re talking to yourself in the chat box. Here’s the images:

The thread: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,628541.0.html

And when you mentioned us about believing you about your life- it’s not that we don’t believe you. It’s just that we’re not gullible. At least I’m not.

Oh and one last thing- if you’re going to lie, at least do it right.

Read full topic
item.source: Project Amazed Version 2.1 || 90% Skills || The Real Deal || The Final Release

item.title: Project Amazed Version 2.1 || 90% Skills || The Real Deal || The Final Release
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Project Amazed Carlos:

You don’t have to believe, me not my fault.

It’s more of the fact that you have the mentality that people in the workforce can do whatever they want and that because they work for a Java gaming company (That, by the way, boasts 10x more failures in gaming than profits). Chances are they’re under a strict contact (as most developers of big companies are) and if they did something like this (develop an illegal server), they would more than likely be fired and suing for half the shit they own, this is made even more prevalent in the fact that they’ve spend their time and money getting servers taken down.

And for your other cousin (who would actually work for Oracle, not Java), he would more than likely shriek at how shitty the code is. We’re not talking of some big business, we’re talking some shitty servers made by teenagers and basically them copy+pasting servers and snippets. Very few people in this community or in the other communities actually make a difference in servers today, witch is why you never see all these great frameworks being used, they’d rather download a PI server, slap a name on it, and put it up.

Read full topic
